short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Simple Squeeze Pages In Seconds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a handy free software that creates very simple squeeze pages. Just a headline, sub-headline and a form. No distractions. It also creates, personalises and links the legal pages for you too.
